overview: When a beloved pooch is dog-napped, three friends join forces to get the animal back. Using the latest gadgets, along with a special computer, the trio begins tracking down clues and meeting a variety of unusual characters. Although they find a map that shows where the dog is located, they choose not to follow it. Everyone has a different idea about which direction to go, and viewers soon realize the similarities between the map and the Bible.
title: The Sparky Chronicles: The Map
